headline: Wells Fargo Raises Aflac (AFL) Target, Revises Earnings Outlook and Valuation Approach
summary: Aflac Incorporated (NYSE:AFL) is included among the 14 Best Affordable Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 25, Wells Fargo analyst Elyse Greenspan raised the firm’s price recommendation on Aflac Incorporated (NYSE:AFL) to $118 from $109. Itreiterated an Equal Weight rating on the shares. The firm said that after reviewing fourth-quarter guidance across […]
